Name: Toy - Bouncing Device
Description:
Summon a bouncing device in front of you.
Springs you sky-high.
Summoned toy lasts 10 minutes.
Description$english:
Summon a bouncing device in front of you.
Springs you sky-high.
Summoned toy lasts 10 minutes.
Description2$english:
Toy Usage Restrictions:
1. This toy cannot be used inside dungeons.
2. Toy summoning is limited per area. Try switching to another if you've reached the max.
3. Toy count is also limited near each character. Please summon in a more open area if needed.
